discussion_comments.comment_body: Let's make all new files `tsx` - it "just works", no reason not.

commented_code:
+import React from 'react'
+import { createPortal } from 'react-dom'
+import { observer } from 'mobx-react'
+
+import appStore from '../lib/app-store'
+
+const UiBlocker = observer(() => {
+  if (!appStore.isUiBlocked) return null
+
+  return createPortal(
+    <div className='ui-blocker' />,
+    document.getElementById('ui-blocker')
+  )
+})
+
+export default UiBlocker

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+import React from 'react'
+import { createPortal } from 'react-dom'
+import { observer } from 'mobx-react'
+
+import appStore from '../lib/app-store'
+
+const UiBlocker = observer(() => {
+  if (!appStore.isUiBlocked) return null
+
+  return createPortal(
+    <div className='ui-blocker' />,
+    document.getElementById('ui-blocker')
+  )
+})
+
+export default UiBlocker
discussion_comments.comment_body: Can we change the name of this to be Scrim. While ui-blocker is descriptive, I think Scrim is a more widely accepted name for what this component represents. For example, here is a commonly accepted definition from Google's [material design of a scrim](https://material.io/design/environment/surfaces.html#attributes) (scroll down to scrim; I could not link directly to the section)
